function.name: ancestor::
function.description: Selects all ancestors (parent,grandparent,etc.) of the current node.

function.name: ancestor-or-self::
function.description: Selects all ancestors (parent,grandparent,etc.) of the current node and the current node itself.

function.name: attribute::
function.description: Selects all attributes of the current node.

function.name: child::
function.description: Selects all children of the current node.

function.name: descendent::
function.description: Selects all descendants (children,grandchildren,etc.) of the current node.

function.name: following::
function.description: Selects everything in the document after the closing tag of the current node.

function.name: following-sibling::
function.description: Selects all siblings after the current node.

function.name: parent::
function.description: Selects the parent of the current node.

function.name: preceding::
function.description: Selects everything in the document that is before the start tag of the current node.

function.name: preceding-sibling::
function.description: Selects all siblings before the current node.
